Name: White Tigers
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
Review: Vanilla and apple pie with an almost creamy mouth feel.
Nutrition: One serving of White Tigers contains 209 calories
